00082 // City Classes:
00083 // "VILLAGE", "TOWN", "CITY", "CAPITAL", "METROPOLIS", "MEGALOPOLIS"
00084 
00085 // City Levels:
00086 // "Easy", "Medium", "Hard"
00087 
00088 // City Problems:
00089 //  "CRIME", "POLLUTION", "HOUSING COSTS", "TAXES",
00090 //  "TRAFFIC", "UNEMPLOYMENT", "FIRES"

00100 void Micropolis::cityEvaluation()
00101 {
00102     //printf("cityEvaluation totalPop %d\n", totalPop);
00103     if (totalPop > 0) {
00104         short problemTable[PROBNUM]; // Score for each problem, higher the more severe the problem is.
00105         for (int z = 0; z < PROBNUM; z++) {
00106             problemTable[z] = 0;
00107         }
00108 
00109         getAssessedValue();
00110         doPopNum();
00111         doProblems(problemTable);
00112         getScore(problemTable);
00113         doVotes();  // How well is the mayor doing?
00114         changeEval();
00115     } else {
00116         evalInit();
00117         cityYes = 50; // No population => no voting. Let's say 50/50.
00118         changeEval();
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00126 void Micropolis::evalInit()
00127 {
00128     cityYes = 0;
00129     cityPop = 0;
00130     cityPopDelta = 0;
00131     cityAssessedValue = 0;
00132     cityClass = CC_VILLAGE;
00133     cityScore = 500;
00134     cityScoreDelta = 0;
00135     for (int i = 0; i < PROBNUM; i++) {
00136         problemVotes[i] = 0;
00137     }
00138     for (int i = 0; i < CVP_PROBLEM_COMPLAINTS; i++) {
00139         problemOrder[i] = CVP_NUMPROBLEMS;
00140     }
00141 }

00143 
00149 void Micropolis::getAssessedValue()
00150 {
00151     Quad z;
00152 
00153     z = roadTotal * 5;
00154     z += railTotal * 10;
00155     z += policeStationPop * 1000;
00156     z += fireStationPop * 1000;
00157     z += hospitalPop * 400;
00158     z += stadiumPop * 3000;
00159     z += seaportPop * 5000;
00160     z += airportPop * 10000;
00161     z += coalPowerPop * 3000;
00162     z += nuclearPowerPop * 6000;
00163 
00164     cityAssessedValue = z * 1000;
00165 }

00172 void Micropolis::doPopNum()
00173 {
00174     Quad oldCityPop = cityPop;
00175 
00176     cityPop = getPopulation();
00177 
00178     if (oldCityPop == -1) {
00179         oldCityPop = cityPop;
00180     }
00181 
00182     cityPopDelta = cityPop - oldCityPop;
00183     cityClass = getCityClass(cityPop);
00184 }
00185 
00187 Quad Micropolis::getPopulation()
00188 {
00189     Quad pop = (resPop + (comPop + indPop) * 8L) * 20L;
00190     return pop;
00191 }

00193 
00200 CityClass Micropolis::getCityClass(Quad cityPopulation)
00201 {
00202     CityClass cityClassification = CC_VILLAGE;
00203 
00204     if (cityPopulation > 2000) {
00205         cityClassification = CC_TOWN;
00206     }
00207     if (cityPopulation > 10000) {
00208         cityClassification = CC_CITY;
00209     }
00210     if (cityPopulation > 50000) {
00211         cityClassification = CC_CAPITAL;
00212     }
00213     if (cityPopulation > 100000) {
00214         cityClassification = CC_METROPOLIS;
00215     }
00216     if (cityPopulation > 500000) {
00217         cityClassification = CC_MEGALOPOLIS;
00218     }
00219 
00220     return cityClassification;
00221 }
00222 
00231 void Micropolis::doProblems(short problemTable[PROBNUM])
00232 {
00233     bool problemTaken[PROBNUM]; // Which problems are taken?
00234 
00235     for (int z = 0; z < PROBNUM; z++) {
00236         problemTaken[z] = false;
00237         problemTable[z] = 0;
00238     }
00239 
00240     problemTable[CVP_CRIME]        = crimeAverage;                /* Crime */
00241     problemTable[CVP_POLLUTION]    = pollutionAverage;            /* Pollution */
00242     problemTable[CVP_HOUSING]      = landValueAverage * 7 / 10;   /* Housing */
00243     problemTable[CVP_TAXES]        = cityTax * 10;                /* Taxes */
00244     problemTable[CVP_TRAFFIC]      = getTrafficAverage();         /* Traffic */
00245     problemTable[CVP_UNEMPLOYMENT] = getUnemployment();           /* Unemployment */
00246     problemTable[CVP_FIRE]         = getFireSeverity();           /* Fire */
00247     voteProblems(problemTable);
00248 
00249     for (int z = 0; z < CVP_PROBLEM_COMPLAINTS; z++) {
00250         // Find biggest problem not taken yet
00251         int maxVotes = 0;
00252         int bestProblem = CVP_NUMPROBLEMS;
00253         for (int i = 0; i < CVP_NUMPROBLEMS; i++) {
00254             if ((problemVotes[i] > maxVotes) && (!problemTaken[i])) {
00255                 bestProblem = i;
00256                 maxVotes = problemVotes[i];
00257             }
00258         }
00259 
00260         // bestProblem == CVP_NUMPROBLEMS means no problem found
00261         problemOrder[z] = bestProblem;
00262         if (bestProblem < CVP_NUMPROBLEMS) {
00263             problemTaken[bestProblem] = true;
00264         }
00265         // else: No problem found.
00266         //       Repeating the procedure will give the same result.
00267         //       Optimize by filling all remaining entries, and breaking out
00268     }
00269 }
00270 
00271 
00278 void Micropolis::voteProblems(const short problemTable[PROBNUM])
00279 {
00280     for (int z = 0; z < PROBNUM; z++) {
00281         problemVotes[z] = 0;
00282     }
00283 
00284     int problem = 0; // Problem to vote for
00285     int voteCount = 0; // Number of votes
00286     int loopCount = 0; // Number of attempts
00287     while (voteCount < 100 && loopCount < 600) {
00288         if (getRandom(300) < problemTable[problem]) {
00289             problemVotes[problem]++;
00290             voteCount++;
00291         }
00292         problem++;
00293         if (problem > PROBNUM) {
00294             problem = 0;
00295         }
00296         loopCount++;
00297     }
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00305 short Micropolis::getTrafficAverage()
00306 {
00307     Quad trafficTotal;
00308     short x, y, count;
00309 
00310     trafficTotal = 0;
00311     count = 1;
00312     for (x=0; x < WORLD_W; x += landValueMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00313         for (y=0; y < WORLD_H; y += landValueMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00314             if (landValueMap.worldGet(x, y) > 0) {
00315                 trafficTotal += trafficDensityMap.worldGet(x, y);
00316                 count++;
00317             }
00318         }
00319     }
00320 
00321     trafficAverage = (short)((trafficTotal / count) * 2.4);
00322 
00323     return trafficAverage;
00324 }
00325 
00326 
00331 short Micropolis::getUnemployment()
00332 {
00333     short b = (comPop + indPop) * 8;
00334 
00335     if (b == 0) {
00336         return 0;
00337     }
00338 
00339     // Ratio total people / working. At least 1.
00340     float r = ((float)resPop) / b;
00341 
00342     b = (short)((r - 1) * 255); // (r - 1) is the fraction unemployed people
00343     return min(b, (short)255);
00344 }
00345 
00346 
00351 short Micropolis::getFireSeverity()
00352 {
00353     return min(firePop * 5, 255);
00354 }
00355 
00356 
00361 void Micropolis::getScore(const short problemTable[PROBNUM])
00362 {
00363     int x, z;
00364     short cityScoreLast;
00365 
00366     cityScoreLast = cityScore;
00367     x = 0;
00368 
00369     for (z = 0; z < CVP_NUMPROBLEMS; z++) {
00370         x += problemTable[z];       /* add 7 probs */
00371     }
00372 
00376     x = x / 3;                    /* 7 + 2 average */
00377     x = min(x, 256);
00378 
00379     z = clamp((256 - x) * 4, 0, 1000);
00380 
00381     if (resCap) {
00382         z = (int)(z * .85);
00383     }
00384 
00385     if (comCap) {
00386         z = (int)(z * .85);
00387     }
00388 
00389     if (indCap) {
00390         z = (int)(z * .85);
00391     }
00392 
00393     if (roadEffect < MAX_ROAD_EFFECT)  {
00394         z -= MAX_ROAD_EFFECT - roadEffect;
00395     }
00396 
00397     if (policeEffect < MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT) {
00398         // 10.0001 = 10000.1 / 1000, 1/10.0001 is about 0.1
00399         z = (int)(z * (0.9 + (policeEffect / (10.0001 * MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT))));
00400     }
00401 
00402     if (fireEffect < MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT) {
00403         // 10.0001 = 10000.1 / 1000, 1/10.0001 is about 0.1
00404         z = (int)(z * (0.9 + (fireEffect / (10.0001 * MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT))));
00405     }
00406 
00407     if (resValve < -1000) {
00408         z = (int)(z * .85);
00409     }
00410 
00411     if (comValve < -1000) {
00412         z = (int)(z * .85);
00413     }
00414 
00415     if (indValve < -1000) {
00416         z = (int)(z * .85);
00417     }
00418 
00419     float SM = 1.0;
00420     if (cityPop == 0 || cityPopDelta == 0) {
00421         SM = 1.0; // there is nobody or no migration happened
00422 
00423     } else if (cityPopDelta == cityPop) {
00424         SM = 1.0; // city sprang into existence or doubled in size
00425 
00426     } else if (cityPopDelta > 0) {
00427         SM = ((float)cityPopDelta / cityPop) + 1.0f;
00428 
00429     } else if (cityPopDelta < 0) {
00430         SM = 0.95f + ((float)cityPopDelta / (cityPop - cityPopDelta));
00431     }
00432 
00433     z = (int)(z * SM);
00434     z = z - getFireSeverity() - cityTax; // dec score for fires and taxes
00435 
00436     float TM = unpoweredZoneCount + poweredZoneCount;   // dec score for unpowered zones
00437     if (TM > 0.0) {
00438         z = (int)(z * (float)(poweredZoneCount / TM));
00439     } else {
00440     }
00441 
00442     z = clamp(z, 0, 1000);
00443 
00444     cityScore = (cityScore + z) / 2;
00445 
00446     cityScoreDelta = cityScore - cityScoreLast;
00447 }
00448 
00449 
00454 void Micropolis::doVotes()
00455 {
00456     int z;
00457 
00458     cityYes = 0;
00459 
00460     for (z = 0; z < 100; z++) {
00461         if (getRandom(1000) < cityScore) {
00462             cityYes++;
00463         }
00464     }
00465 }

00469 void Micropolis::doScoreCard()
00470 {
00471     callback("update", "s", "evaluation");
00472 
00473     // The user interface should pull these raw values out and format
00474     // them. The simulator core used to format them and push them out,
00475     // but the user interface should pull them out and format them
00476     // itself.
00477 
00478     // City Evaluation ${FormatYear(currentYear())}
00479     // Public Opinion
00480     //   Is the mayor doing a good job?
00481     //     Yes: ${FormatPercent(cityYes)}
00482     //     No: ${FormatPercent(100 - cityYes)}
00483     //   What are the worst problems?
00484     //     for i in range(0, CVP_PROBLEM_COMPLAINTS),
00485     //                 while problemOrder[i] < CVP_NUMPROBLEMS:
00486     //     ${probStr[problemOrder[i]]}:
00487     //                  ${FormatPercent(problemVotes[problemOrder[i]])}
00488     // Statistics
00489     //   Population: ${FormatNumber(cityPop)}
00490     //   Net Migration: ${FormatNumber(cityPopDelta)} (last year)
00491     //   Assessed Value: ${FormatMoney(cityAssessedValue))
00492     //   Category: ${cityClassStr[cityClass]}
00493     //   Game Level: ${cityLevelStr[gameLevel]}
00494 }
00495 
00497 void Micropolis::changeEval()
00498 {
00499     //printf("changeEval\n");
00500     evalChanged = true;
00501 }

00503 
00505 void Micropolis::scoreDoer()
00506 {
00507     //printf("scoreDoer evalChanged %d\n", evalChanged);
00508     if (evalChanged) {
00509         doScoreCard();
00510         evalChanged = false;
00511     }
00512 }

00518 int Micropolis::countProblems()
00519 {
00520     int i;
00521     for (i = 0; i < CVP_PROBLEM_COMPLAINTS; i++) {
00522         if (problemOrder[i] == CVP_NUMPROBLEMS) {
00523             break;
00524         }
00525     }
00526     return i;
00527 }
00528 
00535 int Micropolis::getProblemNumber(int i)
00536 {
00537     if (i < 0 || i >= CVP_PROBLEM_COMPLAINTS
00538                         || problemOrder[i] == CVP_NUMPROBLEMS) {
00539         return -1;
00540     } else {
00541         return problemOrder[i];
00542     }
00543 }
00544 
00545 
00552 int Micropolis::getProblemVotes(int i)
00553 {
00554     if (i < 0 || i >= CVP_PROBLEM_COMPLAINTS
00555                         || problemOrder[i] == CVP_NUMPROBLEMS) {
00556         return -1;
00557     } else {
00558         return problemVotes[problemOrder[i]];
00559     }
00560 }
